attributes.action: Total UK Transportation Restructure With Intent to Set an Example to World How To Do It
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Firstly Complete Consolidation of Mass Transport Under a Single Independent Body Funded by the Tax-Payer and Government. All Mass Transport is Free.

Reconstruction Infrastructure to allow for Maximum Efficiency on Mass Transport to all Compliment NOT Compete with each other and Constantly monitor this and update it.

Use the Most Technological Advance Equipment for All major Mass Transport, Minimal damage to Environment, Maximum Efficiency and Safety.

Explore Alternative Methods. Barges are one example. Ferries another e.g. Southampton to Edinburgh. Another would be the use of Airships for the correct uses.
